entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
